summary.span: 表示使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的 Excel 项目中的工作表。

span.span: Represents a worksheet in Excel projects created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象提供相同的成员从 Excel 主互操作程序集，但它的对象将添加以下功能：A object provides the same members as a object from the Excel primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features: - 属性。 property. 将托管的控件添加到 Excel 工作表，或删除控件，在运行时，请使用此属性。Use this property to add managed controls to an Excel worksheet, or to remove controls, at run time. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性来获取基础对象主机项。Use this property to get the underlying object for a host item. - 工作表级事件，如和，仅在 Excel 对象模型中的应用程序级别提供。Worksheet-level events, such as and , that are provided only at the application level in the Excel object model. 也就是说，在 Excel 对象模型中，这些事件中定义类而不是接口。That is, in the Excel object model, these events are defined in the class rather than the interface. 在应用程序级项目中，你可以创建以编程方式通过使用对象`GetVstoObject`方法。In application-level projects, you can create objects programmatically by using the `GetVstoObject` method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). 在文档级项目中，你通常不使用直接对象。In document-level projects, you typically do not use object directly. 请改用`Sheet` * n *类以编程方式访问你的项目中的工作表。Instead, use the `Sheet`*n* classes to programmatically access the worksheets in your project. 每个`Sheet` * n *类派生其大多数成员从类。Each `Sheet`*n* class derives most of its members from the class. 此类将对其成员的所有调用重都定向到的内部实现接口中[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。This class redirects all calls to its members to an internal implementation of the interface in the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取一个表示工作表上一个或多个列的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that represents one or more columns on the worksheet.

value.span: 一个表示工作表上一个或多个列的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents one or more columns on the worksheet.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回对象，其中包含工作表上的所有列。When used without parameters, this property returns a object that contains all the columns on the worksheet. 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于获取工作表上的特定列。This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific columns on the worksheet. 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象。If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a . |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|若要获取的一个或多个列的索引。The index of one or more columns to get.

若要获取的单个列，请将以下对象之一传递给此参数：To get a single column, pass one of the following objects to this parameter:

的一个整数，指定你想要获取的列的索引。- An integer that specifies the index of the column you want to get. 列索引从 1 开始。The column indexes begin at 1.
的你想要获取的列的字母组成字符串。- A string that consists of the letter of the column you want to get.

若要获取多个连续列，请传递与格式字符串"`first column letter`:`last column letter`"。To get multiple contiguous columns, pass a string with the format "`first column letter`:`last column letter`". 例如，若要获取列 A 到 E，传递"A:E"。For example, to get columns A through E, pass "A:E". **注意：** 此参数的名称有误导性; 此参数指定你想要获取，不是行的列的索引。**Note:** The name of this parameter is misleading; this parameter specifies the indexes of the columns you want to get, not the rows.| |`ColumnIndex`|不使用此参数。Do not use this parameter. 此属性将引发如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。This property will throw a if you try to pass a value to this parameter.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks Office 解决方案中的工作表可以包含 Windows 窗体控件和主机控件。A worksheet in an Office solution can contain Windows Forms controls and host controls. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Office 文档上的控件](/visualstudio/vsto/controls-on-office-documents.md)。For more information, see [Controls on Office Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/controls-on-office-documents.md). 若要在运行时管理的工作表上的控件，请使用方法和属性返回对象属性。To manage the controls on a worksheet at run time, use the methods and properties of the object returned by the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md) ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来添加到当前工作表。The following code example uses the property to add a to the current worksheet. 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。This example is for an application-level add-in. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet_AppLevelAddIn#10](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorksheet_AppLevelAddIn/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet_AppLevelAddIn#10](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorksheet_AppLevelAddIn/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`false`，不会重新评估现有的条件格式。When the property is set to `false`, existing conditional formats will not be re-evaluated. 任何以前应用的条件格式设置将仍是可见的但不是会作为单元格的值更新或更改 AppliesTo 范围。Any previously applied conditional formatting will still be visible, but will not be updated as cell values or AppliesTo ranges are changed. 将此属性设置为`true`以对其进行评估之前完全配置一个规则。Set this property to `true` to configure a rule completely before evaluating it. 如果对其应用条件的范围很大，这可能导致性能增加。This can result in a performance increase if the range over which the condition is applied is large.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不知道要传递给该格式参数的字符串，则可以查看尝试在 Excel 中的粘贴命令与在剪贴板上的数据兼容的字符串。If you do not know which string to pass to the Format parameter, you can view the strings that are compatible with the data on the Clipboard by trying the paste command in Excel . 将数据复制到剪贴板，使用**选择性粘贴**在 Excel 中，命令，然后查看中列出的格式**选择性粘贴**对话框。Copy the data to the Clipboard, use the **Paste Special** command in Excel, and then view the formats listed in the **Paste Special** dialog box. `NoHTMLFormatting` 将仅一回事时`Format`="HTML"。`NoHTMLFormatting` will only matter when `Format` = "HTML". 在所有其他情况下，`NoHTMLFormatting`将被忽略。In all other cases, `NoHTMLFormatting` will be ignored. 使用此方法之前，您必须选择目标范围。You must select the destination range before you use this method. 此方法可以修改表的选定区域，具体取决于剪贴板的内容。This method might modify the sheet selection, depending on the contents of the Clipboard. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Pictures(object Index) cil managed

summary.span: 在对数据透视表内的单元格或单元格范围进行编辑或重新计算（针对包含公式的单元格）后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a cell or range of cells inside a PivotTable are edited or recalculated (for cells that contain formulas).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不会在编辑或重新计算单元格以外的任何情况下发生。The event does not occur under any conditions other than editing or recalculating cells. 例如，它时不会出现数据透视表是刷新、 排序、 筛选，或向下钻取，即使这些操作移动单元格，并可能从 OLAP 数据源中检索新值。For example, it will not occur when the PivotTable is refreshed, sorted, filtered, or drilled down on, even though those operations move cells and potentially retrieve new values from the OLAP data source. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在将更改应用于数据透视表之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes are applied to a PivotTable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 立即执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句以将所有更改都应用到数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源之前, 和用户已选择的用户界面以都应用更改后立即时发生事件。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes an UPDATE CUBE statement to apply all changes to the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to apply changes in the user interface. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在针对 OLAP 数据源提交数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes are committed against the OLAP data source for a PivotTable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 立即执行针对数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源，提交事务之前，用户已选择为整个数据透视表中保存更改后立即发生的事件。The event occurs immediately before Excel executes a COMMIT TRANSACTION against the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to save changes for the whole PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在放弃对数据透视表的更改之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes to a PivotTable are discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Excel 执行针对 OLAP 数据源，ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句，如果在事务仍处于活动状态，且然后用户已选择放弃所做的更改之后将丢弃所有数据透视表中, 编辑过的值之前立即发生。Occurs immediately before Excel executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP data source, if a transaction is still active, and then discards all edited values in the PivotTable, after the user has chosen to discard changes. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此事件在 Excel 2007 项目中使用。

span.span: This event is used in an Excel 2007 project.

summary.span: 在对数据透视表进行更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs after changes to a PivotTable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 过程中发生的大多数更改在数据透视表，以便你可以编写代码以响应用户操作，例如清除、 分组或刷新数据透视表中的项。The occurs during most changes to a PivotTable, so that you can write code to respond to user actions, such as clearing, grouping, or refreshing items in the PivotTable. > [!NOTE] > 此事件出现在 IntelliSense Excel 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This event appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，不能在 Excel 2007 项目中使用此事件。However, this event cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

span.span: This property is used in an Excel 2007 project.

span.span: Protects a worksheet so that it cannot be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将应用此方法与`UserInterfaceOnly`参数设置为`true`以及然后保存该工作簿，整张工作表 （而不仅仅是接口） 将完全保护时重新打开工作簿。If you apply this method with the `UserInterfaceOnly` argument set to `true` and then save the workbook, the entire worksheet (not just the interface) will be fully protected when you reopen the workbook. 若要打开工作簿后，重新启用用户界面保护，必须再次应用使用此方法`UserInterfaceOnly`设置为`true`。To re-enable the user interface protection after the workbook is opened, you must again apply this method with `UserInterfaceOnly` set to `true`. 可对受保护工作表进行更改，如果提供密码。It is possible to make changes to a protected worksheet if the password is supplied. 此外，另一种方法将取消保护工作表，进行必要的更改，然后然后再次保护工作表。Also, another method would be to unprotect the worksheet, make the necessary changes, and then protect the worksheet again. > [!NOTE] > 未受保护，则表示可能会锁定该单元格 (**设置单元格格式**对话框)，但包括在中定义的范围**允许用户编辑范围**对话框中，并且用户已取消保护具有密码的范围或已验证通过 NT 权限。'Unprotected' means the cell may be locked (**Format Cells** dialog) but is included in a range defined in the **Allow Users to Edit Ranges** dialog, and the user has unprotected the range with a password or been validated via NT permissions. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Cell1`|采用应用程序语言的以 A1 样式表示法表示的范围名称。The name of the range in A1-style notation in the language of the application. 范围名称可以包括范围运算符（冒号）、交集运算符（空格）或并集运算符（逗号）。It can include the range operator (a colon), the intersection operator (a space), or the union operator (a comma). 范围名称还可以包括货币符号，但是这些符号被忽略。It can also include dollar signs, but they are ignored. 可以在范围的任何部分中使用本地定义的名称。You can use a local defined name in any part of the range. 如果使用一个名称，则假定该名称使用的是应用程序的语言。If you use a name, the name is assumed to be in the language of the application. 此参数是必需的。This parameter is required.| |`Cell2`|范围右下角的单元格。The cell in the lower-right corner of the range. 可以是一个包含单个单元格、整列、整行的 ，或者可以是一个以应用程序的语言命名单个单元格的字符串。Can be a that contains a single cell, an entire column, an entire row, or it can be a string that names a single cell in the language of the application. 此参数可选。This parameter is optional.| 如果你使用无需指定任何参数的属性，它将返回不应在代码中直接使用的对象。If you use the property without specifying any parameters, it will return a object that is not intended to be used directly from your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用不同方式属性来访问单个或多个单元格。The following code example demonstrates different ways to use the property to access a single cell or multiple cells. 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。This example is for an application-level add-in. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet_AppLevelAddIn#42](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorksheet_AppLevelAddIn/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#42)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWorkSheet_AppLevelAddIn#42](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWorksheet_AppLevelAddIn/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#42)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回对象，其中包含工作表上的所有行。When used without parameters, this property returns a object that contains all the rows on the worksheet. 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于获取工作表上的特定行。This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific rows on the worksheet. 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象。If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a . |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|若要获取的一个或多个行的索引。The index of one or more rows to get.

若要获取单个行，请传递一个整数，指定你想要获取的行的索引。To get a single row, pass an integer that specifies the index of the row you want to get. 从 1 开始的行索引。The row indexes begin at 1.

若要获取多个连续行，请传递与格式字符串"`first row`:`last row`"。To get multiple contiguous rows, pass a string with the format "`first row`:`last row`". 例如，若要获取行 1 至 5，可传递"1:5"。For example, to get rows 1 through 5, pass "1:5".| |`ColumnIndex`|不使用此参数。Do not use this parameter. 此属性将引发如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。This property will throw a if you try to pass a value to this parameter.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是要在中调用的最后一个事件对象作为对象卸载。This is the last event to be called in the object as the object unloads. 此事件用于任何其他清理过程。Use this event for any additional clean up. 文档级自定义项，工作表主机项关闭时，将卸载程序集的应用程序域。In a document-level customization, the application domain for the assembly unloads when the worksheet host item shuts down. 在应用程序级外接程序，工作表主机项关闭时，不会不卸载应用程序域。In an application-level add-in, the application domain does not unload when the worksheet host item shuts down. 此外，基础的工作表对象将不再可用。Also, the underlying worksheet object is no more available. 若要访问该工作表关闭使用之前相反。To access the worksheet before it shuts down use instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 功能，除了将文件保存 XML 电子表格格式，将仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中可用。XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003. 如果 XPath 中的 XML 列表中中的列存在则返回的对象是否不包含标头行或插入行。If the XPath exists within a column in an XML list, the object returned does not include the header row or the Insert row. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 功能，除了将文件保存 XML 电子表格格式，将仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中可用。XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003. 与不同方法，方法返回的 XML 列表，包括标题行和插入行的整个列。Unlike the method, the method returns the entire column of an XML list, including the header row and the Insert row. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
